title: Email/Password Sign In Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully sign in using valid email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the Sign In page.
Enter a registered email address in the email input field.
Enter the correct password in the password input field.
Click the Sign In button.
Check that the user is successfully authenticated and redirected to the dashboard.

title: Email/Password Sign In Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that sign-in fails with an appropriate friendly error message when using incorrect email or password.

steps.description: Navigate to the Sign In page.
Enter an unregistered or invalid email address.
Enter an incorrect password.
Click the Sign In button.
Check that an appropriate error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials.
Verify the user remains on the Sign In page.

title: Google Sign-In Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully sign in using the Google sign-in button for authorized domains.

steps.description: Navigate to the Sign In page.
Click the Google Sign-In button.
Complete the Google OAuth popup flow with an authorized Google account.
Ensure the user is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard.

title: Google Sign-In Failure with Unauthorized Domain
description: Verify that users attempting Google sign-in from unauthorized domains receive a friendly error message and sign-in is blocked.

steps.description: Navigate to the Sign In page.
Click the Google Sign-In button.
Attempt Google OAuth login with an email from an unauthorized domain.
Check that a clear and friendly error message about unauthorized domain is displayed.
Ensure the user is not authenticated and remains on the Sign In page.

title: Session Handling After Authentication
description: Verify that user session persists after successful login and allows access to authenticated pages without requiring re-login until session expiration or logout.

steps.description: Sign in successfully via email/password or Google sign-in.
Navigate to several authenticated pages in the dashboard within the same session.
Verify the user remains authenticated and is not redirected to Sign In during navigation.
Refresh the browser tab.
Verify the session persists and user remains logged in.

title: Plan Gating Redirects Free Users
description: Verify that users with free subscription status are redirected from restricted dashboard content to the Upgrade page when accessing gated features.

steps.description: Sign in with a user account on the free plan.
Attempt to access dashboard features gated for premium plans.
Check that the user is redirected to the Upgrade page.
Verify that upgrade options are displayed with clear instructions to upgrade subscription.

title: Upgrade Subscription Flow
description: Verify that users can select and successfully upgrade their subscription plan from the Upgrade page and gain access to premium features.

steps.description: Sign in as a user on a free or lower-tier plan.
Navigate to the Upgrade page.
Select a higher subscription tier and complete upgrade payment flow.
Confirm subscription status updates and premium features become accessible in the dashboard.

title: Landing Page Logo Presence and Animation
description: Verify that the landing page shows exactly one crisp VAYRA logo above the hero headline with fade and scale animation and no layout shifting.

steps.description: Open the landing page (homepage).
Confirm one VAYRA logo is visible above the hero H1 headline.
Verify the logo has a fade and scale animation on page load.
Ensure there is no cumulative layout shift (CLS) during and after animation.

title: Header Logo Links to Homepage
description: Verify that the header logo is displayed on all pages and clicking it navigates to the homepage.

steps.description: Navigate to authentication pages (Sign In, Sign Up) and dashboard pages.
Confirm the header logo is visible on each page.
Click the header logo.
Verify the user is navigated to the landing page (homepage).

title: Multi-Language UI Update
description: Verify that selecting a different language via the language selector updates the UI text dynamically without page reload.

steps.description: Sign in or visit any page with language selector component.
Open the language selector and select a different language.
Check that all translatable UI texts update immediately to the selected language.
Verify no UI breakage or layout issues occur after language change.

title: Currency Switcher Functionality
description: Verify that switching currencies via the currency switcher updates displayed currency formatting and conversions throughout the UI.

steps.description: Navigate to pricing, subscription, or financial overview pages.
Use the currency switcher component to select a different currency.
Verify all affected amounts refresh to reflect the newly selected currency and correct formatting.

title: Dark/Light Mode Toggle
description: Verify the theme switcher toggles between dark and light themes and persists user preference across sessions.

steps.description: Locate and activate the theme switcher to toggle theme.
Verify the UI updates immediately to the selected dark or light theme.
Refresh the page.
Confirm the previously selected theme remains applied after reload.

title: PWA Manifest and Icon Accessibility
description: Verify the PWA manifest and icons are accessible (HTTP 200) and properly configured with maskable icons for install prompt.

steps.description: Request the PWA manifest.json file.
Verify HTTP 200 response and correct JSON schema.
Request all PWA icon files referenced in the manifest.
Verify HTTP 200 response for each icon and presence of maskable icon properties.

title: PWA Install Prompt Flow
description: Verify that the app can be installed as a PWA on Android/iOS devices and behaves offline using service worker caching.

steps.description: Access the site on a supported mobile device or emulator.
Trigger the install prompt and confirm the user can add the app to the home screen.
After installation, disconnect network connectivity.
Launch the installed app.
Verify the app loads and functions in offline mode, showing cached content.

title: Accessibility Keyboard Navigation
description: Verify full keyboard navigation support including focus rings and logical tab order across landing, authentication, and dashboard pages.

steps.description: Navigate through all pages using keyboard only (Tab, Shift+Tab, Enter, Space).
Ensure all interactive elements receive visible focus rings in order.
Verify no keyboard traps or inaccessible UI components.

title: Accessibility Audit Zero Critical Issues
description: Perform an automated and manual accessibility audit on landing and authentication pages, expecting zero critical WCAG 2.1 AA violations.

steps.description: Run accessibility audit tools (e.g., Lighthouse, axe) on landing and authentication pages.
Ensure no critical (blocker/severe) accessibility issues are reported.
Manually verify alt text for logos, ARIA labels for modals/forms, and consistent heading structure.

title: Error Boundary Handling
description: Verify that UI error boundaries catch and display appropriate fallback UI for unexpected runtime errors, preventing app crashes.

steps.description: Simulate a runtime error in a child component (e.g., force an exception).
Check that the error boundary displays a user-friendly fallback UI.
Verify that the rest of the app remains functional and no crash occurs.

title: Not Found Page Display
description: Verify that navigating to an unknown route displays the dedicated Not Found error page with navigation options.

steps.description: Manually enter an invalid or non-existent URL path in the browser.
Check the Not Found (404) page is displayed with relevant messaging.
Verify presence of navigation options to return to valid pages.

title: Responsive UI on Mobile and Desktop
description: Verify that the UI layout is responsive with no content overlap or CLS on both mobile (375×812) and desktop (1280×800) viewports.

steps.description: Resize browser or use device emulator to emulate mobile viewport 375×812.
Check that all UI elements are visible, well spaced, and without overlap on landing, authentication, and dashboard pages.
Resize browser or use device emulator to emulate desktop viewport 1280×800.
Verify the layout adjusts appropriately with no layout shift or element collisions.

title: Console Logs Free From Errors and Warnings
description: Verify that no errors or warnings appear in the developer console during navigation, interactions, and page loads.

steps.description: Open developer console in browser.
Navigate through key pages: Landing, Sign In, Dashboard, Upgrade, Pricing.
Perform common user actions (login, logout, upgrade subscription, switch theme/language).
Verify no console errors or warnings are emitted during any actions or page loads.

title: Pricing Page Displays Plan Options Correctly
description: Verify the Pricing page displays all subscription plans with correct pricing, features, and upgrade call-to-actions.

steps.description: Navigate to the Pricing page.
Verify all subscription tiers are listed with correct prices and feature descriptions.
Check that upgrade buttons are visible and functional.
